body: So she never found out he's a cheater eh?? Damn, ... Also if you say "he was raped" ... No, he did nothing against his will lol... He wasn't restrained, blackmailed, unconscious or threatened... He could have left but stayed, wish she left him
I read ch. 1-5 now...  The art is amazing and the story is interesting.  It's too bad it's not getting much attention
